tweet_texts:
Food for thought:
What if money was designed to get you more over time, not less?
#Bitcoin

We're excited to welcome @VitalikButerin as keynote speaker of this year's Machine Learning and Blockchain Research Summit.

Register now to join us virtually on 5.2 and connect with leading experts from the blockchain and AI industries.

→ http://coinbase.com/ml-bc-summit

Join us tomorrow for a great discussion on national security with a fantastic group of experts
@BlockchainAssn @KMSmithDC @ARedbord @DavidJUrban @CampbellJAustin https://x.com/BlockchainAssn/BlockchainAssn/status/1777032537379946649…

Our Break The Cycle ad is nominated for a #Webby.
It struck a nerve with people inside and outside this space who all want a better system.

A vote for this ad is a vote for just that—a better system.

Vote here → https://vote.webbyawards.com/PublicVoting#/2024/advertising-media-pr/advertising-campaigns/best-video-campaign…

Maybe next year's voting can be onchain.…

Accept that it will always be this way.
 Build something better. 
#UpdateTheSystem

Good news. 

We are now registered as a Restricted Dealer in Canada, making us the first international and largest exchange registered there.

Learn more: http://coinbase.com/blog/coinbase-obtains-registration-as-a-restricted-dealer-in-canada…

Millions of Canadians own digital assets.
86% of them believe the financial system needs an update.

Registration is the latest step in doing just that.

Regulation is critical. 29% of non-crypto owners said they'd buy if there were more industry regulation.

We’re committed to continuing our work with Canadian policymakers and regulators to make Canada a leader in the global crypto economy.

The future of money is here.

Over 300 guests including builders and policymakers attended the #UpdateTheSystem summit in DC.

Thanks to all who attended to discuss how crypto and onchain technology are helping move money, and America, forward.

tweet_texts:
Food for thought:
What if money was designed to get you more over time, not less?
#Bitcoin

We're excited to welcome @VitalikButerin as keynote speaker of this year's Machine Learning and Blockchain Research Summit.

Register now to join us virtually on 5.2 and connect with leading experts from the blockchain and AI industries.

→ http://coinbase.com/ml-bc-summit

Join us tomorrow for a great discussion on national security with a fantastic group of experts
@BlockchainAssn @KMSmithDC @ARedbord @DavidJUrban @CampbellJAustin https://x.com/BlockchainAssn/BlockchainAssn/status/1777032537379946649…

Our Break The Cycle ad is nominated for a #Webby.
It struck a nerve with people inside and outside this space who all want a better system.

A vote for this ad is a vote for just that—a better system.

Vote here → https://vote.webbyawards.com/PublicVoting#/2024/advertising-media-pr/advertising-campaigns/best-video-campaign…

Maybe next year's voting can be onchain.…

Accept that it will always be this way.
 Build something better. 
#UpdateTheSystem

Good news. 

We are now registered as a Restricted Dealer in Canada, making us the first international and largest exchange registered there.

Learn more: http://coinbase.com/blog/coinbase-obtains-registration-as-a-restricted-dealer-in-canada…

Millions of Canadians own digital assets.
86% of them believe the financial system needs an update.

Registration is the latest step in doing just that.

Regulation is critical. 29% of non-crypto owners said they'd buy if there were more industry regulation.

We’re committed to continuing our work with Canadian policymakers and regulators to make Canada a leader in the global crypto economy.

The future of money is here.

Over 300 guests including builders and policymakers attended the #UpdateTheSystem summit in DC.

Thanks to all who attended to discuss how crypto and onchain technology are helping move money, and America, forward.
